attributes.action: Protect the law abiding citizens of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yob and gang culture is now getting out of hand, the Government MUST take immediate action to bring back safety to our streets and allow law abiding citizens to walk through our estates without FEAR.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
